name: Ibuki
title: The Stealthy Ninja
subtitle: A skilled kunoichi who strikes from the shadows with deadly precision
lore: A highly trained ninja who has mastered the art of stealth and assassination. Ibuki combines her exceptional agility with deadly kunai and shadow techniques to eliminate her targets. Her ability to mark and hunt down enemies makes her a feared presence on the battlefield.

passive.name: Mark of the Assassin
passive.description: Ibuki's accurate abilities mark the enemy for [6s]. The marked enemy takes a bonus [65%] damage from Ibuki on the next hit. If the marked enemy is below [7% MaxHP], they take [200%] damage from Ibuki. The mark disappears after taking damage. Ibuki gains [15% MS] when moving towards marked targets.

Q.name: Kunai Toss
Q.description:
Ibuki throws a Kunai in the targeted direction. Two options are available:
Click: Short range [75/100/300/385/465/555] damage
Hold: Long range [95/200/410/675/850] damage

W.name: Shinobi Dash
W.description: Ibuki can jump to an enemy marked by her passive.

E.name: Shadowstep
E.description: After activating the ability, Ibuki becomes invisible for a maximum of [2s] after [0.45s]. If Ibuki deals damage or uses an ability, the invisibility is canceled.

R.name: Sonic Leap
R.description: Ibuki leaps onto all enemies she has damaged in the last [8s]. During this time, Ibuki becomes untargetable and continuously dashes. All affected enemies take [555/1225/1400/1805] damage and are marked with her passive again. This ability does not work with passive damage.

1.name: Movement Speed
1.description: If Ibuki damages an enemy, she gains a bonus [20% MS] for [1.2s].

1.name: CC Immunity
1.description: After using Shinobi Dash, Ibuki is immune to crowd control for [2s].

1.name: Slow Immunity
1.description: Ibuki cannot be slowed during the game.

5.name: Shadowstep Enhancement
5.description: Shadowstep lasts [1s] longer and deals [4%] more damage for [2s] after use.

5.name: Basic Attack Enhancement
5.description: Ibuki's basic attacks deal [15%] more damage.

5.name: Low HP Power
5.description: When Ibuki's HP is below [45%], she deals [10%] more damage.

10.name: Sonic Stealth
10.description: After using the R ability, Ibuki enters Shadowstep, and the E ability can be reactivated for extension.

10.name: Sonic Speed
10.description: After using the R ability, Ibuki gains [+50% MS] for [4s].

15.name: Kunai Range
15.description: Ibuki's short and long Kunai range increases.

15.name: Kunai Cooldown
15.description: The Q ability's cooldown is reduced by [1s].

20.name: Extended Stealth
20.description: Ibuki can stay in Shadowstep for up to [20s], but enemy damage can break it, and nearby enemies reveal her.

20.name: Double Kunai
20.description: If both Kunai hit the same target, Ibuki's next basic attack deals [50%] more damage to that enemy.

20.name: Movement Speed Item
20.description: Item: Upon activation, Ibuki gains [+100% MS] for [4s] with a [30s cd]. On a kill, the cooldown is reduced to [5s].

20.name: Kunai Charges
20.description: Item: Upon activation, Ibuki gains [+2 Kunai charge] with a [45s cd].

weaknesses: Vulnerable when abilities are on cooldown
